success_text: You successfully translate part of the ancient text and gain insight into forgotten magic
failure_text: The runes remain indecipherable to you

success_text: The runes respond to your touch and grant you a magical blessing
failure_text: The runes burn your hand with magical energy

success_text: You successfully open the cache and claim the hidden treasure
failure_text: You fail to pick the lock and it jams permanently

success_text: You smash open the cache and retrieve the contents
failure_text: You damage the cache and some items are destroyed in the process

success_text: The magical water restores your energy and grants temporary magical sight
failure_text: The water makes you violently ill

success_text: You successfully preserve some of the magical water for later use
failure_text: The water loses its magical properties when removed from the spring

success_text: The forgotten deity answers your prayer with a blessing
You discover hidden compartments containing ancient artifacts
You successfully harvest a valuable magical crystal
failure_text: The crystal shatters when you touch it

success_text: You successfully attune to the crystals and gain magical insight
failure_text: The crystals reject your attempt at attunement
